name: Defeat Mr. Manic Mechanic's Robots
description:
Mr. Manic Mechanic has unleashed his robots onto the world. It is up to you to defeat them all!

Defeat Mr. Manic Mechanic's Robots was created for the Bullet Hell Game Jam, Hosted by Harman Kamboj and SkyanSam.

Every 10 Seconds, a random thing is dropped from the sky.
Currently, there are 4:
 Bomb: Use space to detonate when picked up.
 MedKit: Heals 4 HP when picked up.
 Energy Drink: Increases Speed for 5 seconds.
 Robot Oil: Doubles all robot's speed for 5 seconds when a robot picks it up.

Controls:
W or Up Arrow Key to move up.
A or Left Arrow Key to move left.
S or Down Arrow Key to move down.
D or Right Arrow Key to move right.
Move your mouse to aim.
Click to shoot.
Space to detonate a bomb if you have picked one up.
